You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Fleurcrux" Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Armourizer Fleurcrux Deva Dragonsong" once per turn.
2080615.name: Armourizer Fleurcrux Deva Dragonsong

2080787.effect: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. For the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Fusion Monsters, until you Normal or Special Summon a Fusion Monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "Fleurcrux" or "Cruxshift" card to your hand, also place the rest on the bottom of your Deck in any order. You can only use each effect of "Armourizer Fleurcrux Devileye" once per turn.
2080787.name: Armourizer Fleurcrux Devileye

2080794.effect: Target 1 non-Fusion "Armorizer" or "Armourizer" monster you control; send it to the GY, also, after that, if it left the field by this effect, Special Summon 1 "Fleurcrux Deva" monster from your Extra Deck with the same Attribute that the sent monster had when it was on the field (its original Attribute, if face-down). You can negate the effects of 1 "Fleurcrux Deva" Fusion Monster you control; add this card from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cruxshift Activate!" once per turn. Non-"Fleurcrux" monsters sent to the GY by this card's effect cannot activate their effects in the GY.
2080794.name: Cruxshift Reverb

2080817.effect: Target 1 "Fleurcrux" Fusion Monster you control; return it to the Extra Deck, then Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Fleurcrux Deva" with a different name. (This Special Summon is treated as a Special Summon with a "Cruxshift" Quick-Play Spell.)
2080817.name: Cruxshift Transmodify

2109522.effect:
If you control another "Hieratic" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Tributed: You can apply 1 of the following effects. You can only use each effect of "Hieratic Dragon of Tutan" once per turn.
●Special Summon 1 Dragon Normal Monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, also its ATK/DEF becomes 0.
●Add 1 "Hieratic" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
2109522.name: Hieratic Dragon of Tutan

2164402.effect:
2+ Level 2 Dinosaur monsters
If you would Summon a Level 8 or higher "Ancestagon" monster(s) by its own effect, you can detach the appropriate materials from this card instead, then add those detached materials to your Extra Deck, face-up. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ancestagon Duke Silveraptor" once per turn.
● If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 "Ancestagon" Field Spell from your Deck or GY to your hand.
● When a card your opponent controls activates its effect (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "Ancestagon" card you control; banish that card.
● If this card is Tributed or destroyed by battle or card effect: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
2164402.name: Ancestagon Duke Silveraptor
2164402.pendulum_effect: You can add 1 Level 8 or higher "Ancestagon" Pendulum Monster you control to your Extra Deck, face-up, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 Level 8 or higher "Ancestagon" monster from your hand or Deck with a different original name from that added monster. You can only use this effect of "Ancestagon Duke Silveraptor" once per turn.

2164444.effect: Special Summon 1 Level 2 "Ancestagon" monster from your hand, GY or face-up Extra Deck. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 Level 8 or higher "Ancestagon" monster from your Deck to your Extra Deck, face-up. You can only use each effect of "Ancestagon Frontline" once per turn.
2164444.name: Ancestagon Frontline
